name: yt-chat
description: Get Answers from a Youtube video with references

scripts.dev:server: cd server && uv run fastapi dev main.py
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && uv sync
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && uv run ruff check .
scripts.format: cd client && npm run format && cd ../server && uv run ruff format .
